name: First Doctrines
description: Why is Spock attempting to erase his own Starfleet career? Join Captains Pike and Kirk to find the answers, and prove to more exacting Vulcan officers that there must be a method behind Spock's madness.
rules:
-- In this Hybrid Event, you will complete Supply Missions in one Phase, and Ship Battles in another Phase.
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- Unique Ship Battles and Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Solok, Pike, Kirk, Vulcans, or EV Suit Spock will provide a bonus to Ship Battles and Supply Missions.
-- Using the Federation Fighter, U.S.S. T'Kumbra, or Suurok Class Combat Cruiser will provide a hull bonus in Skirmish Battles.
-- Every Ship Battle or Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Solok, Pike, Kirk, Vulcans or EV Suit Spock
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: T'Pring
featured_crew.flavor: Not quite Spock’s wife and not quite his betrothed, T’Pring claimed kal-if-fee in order to be with Stonn instead.

featured_crew.name: Pike
featured_crew.flavor: Looking for a source of power for the Red Angel suit, Pike seeks answers on Boreth.

adventures.name: Grand Theft Starship
adventures.description: Review Spock's hijacking of Pike and the Enterprise.

adventures.name: Denevan Parasite
adventures.description: How did Spock's temporary blindness affect him?

adventures.name: Secret Sister
adventures.description: Did Spock ever speak of Burnham or the Discovery?

adventures.name: Service Record
adventures.description: An unredacted account of Spock's career.

rewards.name: First Doctrines
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

content.reroll_info:
Skirmish rewards are additive. By continuously rolling you receive additional rewards. No rewards are lost by rolling again.
DROP RATES:
Event VP: 13.58%
Time Portal Pack: 0.13%
Chronitons: 11.45%
Honor: 14.11%
Intel: 27.43%
Credits: 33.29%

rewards.name: Pike
rewards.flavor: Looking for a source of power for the Red Angel suit, Pike seeks answers on Boreth.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

next_threshold_rewards.name: Chronitons
next_threshold_rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

screens.text: "Spock has nothing to be ashamed of. My own record wouldn't be what it is without him. He's never expressed any doubts or frustrations with Starfleet to me."

"Humans are illogical. Spock is half-human. Ergo, I would not expect logic to enter into this or any other decision he has ever made. We must stop regarding Spock as a colleague and start regarding him as a threat."

"That's a big leap from where we are now, Solok, and I'm not ready to make it. Between myself and Jim, we've seen nearly all of Spock's career, and we know all the details that don't make it into the official record. Let's delve into that and see if we can't find an answer."
"Solok, can you honestly look at your own record and tell me you've never made a mistake? Of course Spock has! We all have!"

responses.text: "By whose authority, Captain? We're three to one against."
"Which mistake drove Spock to this? Did we find out?"
"I'm with you, Solok. Anyone who'd hurt Starfleet is no friend of mine."

screens.text: "Spock's past actions do not concern me. What matters is what Spock is doing now. His interference is harming Starfleet and the Federation, which is in turn harming the galaxy at large. I cannot allow it to continue--and I will use force to ensure it does not."
"Not yet, but we could if Solok would just give us a little damn more time!"
"Spock was out saving Starfleet when you weren't even a twinkle in your father's eye. We owe him more than regulation dismissal."
"We are all captains. I do not require your approval, nor does your disapproval carry any weight. I will stop Spock. Solok out."
"Chris, let's get after the T'Kumbra before Solok blasts Spock out of the stars. Captain, you're welcome to join us--but if not, you're cautioned to stay out of our way."
